channel.title: IATI submitted to UK Open Standards process
channel.description:
We are processing the IATI Standard through the UK Government Open Standards process. This process goes through [four different stages](https://standards.data.gov.uk/), and is currently in the Response stage, seeking solutions from experts (you good people!) to meet the user need described in the Suggestion stage.
In the Response stage, I have suggested that IATI meets the user need for openly sharing information on international development. Can I encourage you (particularly if you are resident in the UK) now to contribute your support to that response, over the next few days. You can [submit the response here](https://standards.data.gov.uk/challenge/open-standard-international-development-data).
Thanks
John
